mapper.sql: a.sched_name AS "schedName", a.trigger_name AS "triggerName", a.trigger_group AS "triggerGroup", a.job_name AS "jobName", a.job_group AS "jobGroup", a.description AS "description", a.next_fire_time AS "nextFireTime", a.prev_fire_time AS "prevFireTime", a.priority AS "priority", a.trigger_state AS "triggerState", a.trigger_type AS "triggerType", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.calendar_name AS "calendarName", a.misfire_instr AS "misfireInstr", a.job_data AS "jobData", b.cron_expression AS "cronExpression"
LEFT JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers b ON a.sched_name = b.sched_name AND a.trigger_name = b.trigger_name AND a.trigger_group = b.trigger_group
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qrtz_triggers( sched_name, trigger_name, trigger_group, job_name, job_group, description, next_fire_time, prev_fire_time, priority, trigger_state, trigger_type, start_time, end_time, calendar_name, misfire_instr ) VALUES ( #{schedName}, #{triggerName}, #{triggerGroup}, #{jobName}, #{jobGroup}, #{description}, #{nextFireTime}, #{prevFireTime}, #{priority}, #{triggerState}, #{triggerType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{calendarName}, #{misfireInstr} )
